content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Denver Parks and Recreation</origin>         <pubdate>20111001</pubdate>         <title>Athletic Fields</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This dataset is a polygon representation of the location and orientation of athletic fields in parks or other areas maintained by the Department of Parks and Recreation within the City and County of Denver.</abstract>       <purpose>This dataset should be used as a reference to locate athletic fields in parks and other areas maintained by the Department of Parks and Recreation within the City and County of Denver.  The data should be used for planning and design purposes or cartogrpahic purposes only.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <progress>Complete</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.110037</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.734005</eastbc>         <northbc>39.825192</northbc>         <southbc>39.612661</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>Baseball</themekey>         <themekey>Softball</themekey>         <themekey>Soccer</themekey>         <themekey>Lacrosse</themekey>         <themekey>Football</themekey>         <themekey>Rugby</themekey>         <themekey>Volleyball</themekey>         <themekey>Field</themekey>         <themekey>Multiuse</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:  This dataset is provided as read-only and is restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only.  Contact the GIS Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions.  USE CONSTRAINTS:  The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and mployees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES  </useconst>     <datacred>Denver Parks and Recreation</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>RESTRICT - 1</secsys>       <secclass>Restricted</secclass>       <sechandl>Read access to all city users via LVM (Locate View Map). Data available to those with access to SDE layers.</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414</native>   </idinfo>
